title: Kamala Harris' husband Doug Emhoff admits cheating on first wife as nanny pregnancy allegations surface
content: Doug Emhoff, husband of US Vice President Kamala Harris, admitted to an affair during his first marriage after a report alleged he had an affair with a nanny who became pregnant. He disclosed the affair during Biden’s vetting process and informed Harris before their marriage. The nanny did not deny the claims.
summary: Doug Emhoff, husband of US Vice President Kamala Harris, admitted to an affair during his first marriage after a report alleged he had an affair with a nanny who became pregnant. He disclosed the affair during Biden’s vetting process and informed Harris before their marriage. The nanny did not deny the claims.

title: Iran arrests dozens in search for suspects
content: ​​The high-level arrests came after the killing early Wednesday of Ismail Haniyeh, who had led Hamas' political office in Qatar and was visiting Tehran for the inauguration of Iran's new president and staying in northern Tehran, Iran's capital.
summary: ​​The high-level arrests came after the killing early Wednesday of Ismail Haniyeh, who had led Hamas' political office in Qatar and was visiting Tehran for the inauguration of Iran's new president and staying in northern Tehran, Iran's capital.

title: Who is Josh Shapiro? Kamala Harris' possible choice for running mate
content: Josh Shapiro, the governor of Pennsylvania, emerged as a strong contender for Kamala Harris's vice-presidential pick in the upcoming election. As the former Attorney General and with high approval ratings, Shapiro has garnered support across party lines. Progressives expressed concerns about his policy decisions. Shapiro remains a vocal supporter of Israel while criticizing Prime Minister Netanyahu.
summary: Josh Shapiro, the governor of Pennsylvania, emerged as a strong contender for Kamala Harris's vice-presidential pick in the upcoming election. As the former Attorney General and with high approval ratings, Shapiro has garnered support across party lines. Progressives expressed concerns about his policy decisions. Shapiro remains a vocal supporter of Israel while criticizing Prime Minister Netanyahu.

title: Iranian agents, explosives in 3 rooms: How Mossad executed plan to assassinate Hamas chief
'Is she going to be a coward and ... ': Donald Trump Jr takes aim at Kamala Harris over debate speculation
content: Donald Trump Jr criticized Kamala Harris in a tweet, questioning if she would participate in the proposed presidential debate against his father on Fox News. This follows Trump's recent debate with Joe Biden on CNN. President Biden has withdrawn his reelection bid, endorsing Harris, but her campaign hasn't confirmed the debate yet.
summary: Donald Trump Jr criticized Kamala Harris in a tweet, questioning if she would participate in the proposed presidential debate against his father on Fox News. This follows Trump's recent debate with Joe Biden on CNN. President Biden has withdrawn his reelection bid, endorsing Harris, but her campaign hasn't confirmed the debate yet.

US warns of imminent famine in Sudan, poised to be the deadliest in decades as global attention wavers
content: In Sudan's Darfur region, a famine in camps for displaced people worsened as warring factions obstructed aid efforts. US officials warned the crisis could become more severe than recent major famines. Aid organisations are calling for a cease-fire and increased aid access across Sudan. The conflict started in April 2023, escalating the humanitarian crisis.
summary: In Sudan's Darfur region, a famine in camps for displaced people worsened as warring factions obstructed aid efforts. US officials warned the crisis could become more severe than recent major famines. Aid organisations are calling for a cease-fire and increased aid access across Sudan. The conflict started in April 2023, escalating the humanitarian crisis.

Tropical storm brewing: Emergency declared in Florida as heavy rain, strong winds expected
content: A disorganised weather system moved across Cuba, leading to strong winds, heavy rains, and ocean surges in Florida. Expected to become Tropical Storm Debby, it could deliver 12 inches of rain and strong winds as it heads north. Emergency orders are in place, and authorities urge residents to prepare with essential supplies.
summary: A disorganised weather system moved across Cuba, leading to strong winds, heavy rains, and ocean surges in Florida. Expected to become Tropical Storm Debby, it could deliver 12 inches of rain and strong winds as it heads north. Emergency orders are in place, and authorities urge residents to prepare with essential supplies.

title: Trump agrees to participate in debate with Kamala Harris on September 4
content: Former US President Donald Trump announced on his Truth Social platform that he accepted Fox News' invitation to debate Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4 in Pennsylvania. The debate will be moderated by Bret Baier and Martha MacCallum. Trump's previous ABC News debate with President Joe Biden was cancelled. Harris had expressed readiness to debate Trump following her nomination as the Democratic Party's presidential candidate.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump announced on his Truth Social platform that he accepted Fox News' invitation to debate Vice President Kamala Harris on September 4 in Pennsylvania. The debate will be moderated by Bret Baier and Martha MacCallum. Trump's previous ABC News debate with President Joe Biden was cancelled. Harris had expressed readiness to debate Trump following her nomination as the Democratic Party's presidential candidate.
